summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. The invoice details charges for transportation and special handling, totaling $70.20, and includes information about the shipment's pickup and delivery locations.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the FedEx invoice for shipping services, indicating his use of FedEx for transportation needs.

persons.name: Jean Huguen
persons.context: Jean Huguen is mentioned as the recipient of a shipment sent by Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a connection between the two.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein sent a shipment to Jean Huguen, as indicated in the shipment details of the invoice.

events.title: Shipment Pickup
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx for delivery to Jean Huguen.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
Hotel de la Victoire, Rue de Aboukir 11, Paris 75002, France
keyFacts: The invoice is dated August 8, 2005, and details charges for shipping services.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $70.20.
The shipment was picked up on July 28, 2005.
The invoice indicates a shipment was sent from New York to Paris.
There is a mention of a discount applied to the invoice.
